disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: The following design suggestions are provided for informational purposes only and should not be considered as professional architectural advice. Always consult a certified architect for specific local building codes and Vastu principles adherence.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows. Designed for immediate impression and smooth flow to the living areas.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan contemporary living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural lighting and provide a connection with the outdoor spaces. Vastu compliant location in the south-east for harmony.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen designed with efficiency in mind, located adjacent to the living room for convenience. Natural light ensured via window placements that respect Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A versatile dining space integrated with the living area, promoting social interaction and a seamless flow of movement between spaces.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom ensuring privacy. Vastu placement in the northeast for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom with modern fixtures and water-saving features. Proper ventilation ensured.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room and entrance hall for maximum natural light.
Contemporary door designs with glass panels to maintain an open feel.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for optimal natural light and Vastu-compliant north-eastern placement.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: A private en-suite bathroom designed to be serene and functional with modern fixtures.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows strategically placed for light and privacy.
Rooftop terrace access ensuring an airy transition to the outdoor space.

vastu_overview.key_elements_alignment: Master Bedroom placed in north-east for positive energy. Kitchen is located in south-west, which is auspicious according to Vastu. Living area oriented towards the east for sunlight.

rooftop_terrace.description: A contemporary rooftop terrace designed with modern materials and landscaping that offers panoramic views and a private retreat.
